common.interestedMessage: Interested in collaborating or have a project in mind? I'd love to hear from you.

hero.headline: KENG HER
hero.description: Transforming ideas into pixel-perfect, performant web experiences

resume.summary: Creative Frontend Developer with 5+ years of experience crafting immersive, high-performance web experiences. Specialized in React, Next.js, and modern animation libraries. Passionate about translating complex designs into pixel-perfect, accessible interfaces.

achievements.led: Led the frontend architecture for a SaaS platform serving 100K+ users
achievements.reduced: Reduced page load times by 40% through code splitting and lazy loading
achievements.mentored: Mentored a team of 4 junior developers on React best practices
achievements.implemented: Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 60%
achievements.developed: Developed 20+ responsive websites for enterprise clients
achievements.created: Created reusable component library used across 15 projects
achievements.integrated: Integrated complex animations using GSAP and Framer Motion
achievements.collaborated: Collaborated with design team to establish UI/UX standards
achievements.implementedDesigns: Implemented responsive designs from Figma mockups

education.bsComputerScience: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

achievements.recognizedUi: Recognized for innovative UI/UX in fintech category
achievements.topContributor: Top 100 contributor to React ecosystem packages

footer.projectMessage: Whether you have a project in mind or just want to connect, I'm always open to discussing new opportunities.

features.pixelPerfectDesc: Every component crafted with attention to detail, ensuring designs translate perfectly from Figma to code.
features.performanceFirstDesc: Optimized for Core Web Vitals with lazy loading, code splitting, and efficient rendering strategies.
features.responsiveDesignDesc: Fluid layouts that adapt seamlessly across devices, from mobile-first to large desktop displays.
features.cleanArchitectureDesc: Maintainable, scalable codebases with clear separation of concerns and reusable component patterns.
